mapper.select: SELECT * FROM un_read_message t WHERE t.`send_user_id`=#{sendUserId} AND t.`receive_user_id`=#{receiveUserId} ORDER BY t.`date` ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT u.`id`,u.`user_name`,COUNT(un.`receive_user_id`) AS un_read_message_count FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN `un_read_message` un ON u.`id`= un.`send_user_id` WHERE un.`receive_user_id`=#{userId} GROUP BY u.`id`
